gameDetails.name: Trains: Gen Con 2013
gameDetails.description: Trains: Gen Con 2013 is a single-sided game board for use with Trains that features the landscape of Indianapolis and Indiana (USA); it includes the Gen Con logo as part of the city of Indianapolis. This expansion was included as part of AEG's "Swag Bag" for attendees of the AEG 2013 Big Game Night event at Gen Con 2013.
